changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la gestion du ch: Correction of a bug on the management of the spa heating (2
Correction of a bug on the management of the spa heating

index.md.Plugin permetant de controler le Bestway: Plugin allowing to control the Bestway Lazy Spa Milan through Jeedom
index.md.Il permet de gerer automatiquement la fi: It automatically manages filtration and its duration according to the water temperature
index.md.la liste des modules compatible avec le: the list of modules compatible with the plugin
index.md.Si vous cochez la case de gestion de la: If you check the automatic filtration management box then the plugin will itself calculate at the start of each hour the filtration time required according to the average water temperature over the previous hour (based on on the formula filtration time in hours = water temperature / 2
